name: Book Pendant - Made to Order
description:
** Made to order -- choose either a gold or silver bail and the color of the leather cover **

These miniature leather covered book pendants are bound like proper little books! The text block is sewn by hand and the blank pages can be leafed through and written on. Each bitty book pendant has its own unique variation and character and are an ideal one of a kind gift for people who love books!

Pendants vary slightly in size but are generally approximately 2.5-3.0 (h) x 2.0 (w) x 1.0 (d) cm \\ 1-- 1 1/8 (h) x 4/5 (w) x 3/8 (d) inch.

Leather colors include:

- red (smooth or textured)
- orange (smooth)
- light orange (smooth)
- yellow (smooth)
- orange-brown (smooth)
- camel (smooth)
- medium brown (smooth)
- mottled brown (textured)
- red-brown (smooth)
- dark brown (smooth or textured)
- dark green (textured)
- dark blue (textured)
- plum purple (textured)
- black (smooth or textured)

name: Bitty Book Pendant - Camel
description:
This miniature leather covered book pendant is bound like a proper book! The text block is sewn by hand and the blank pages can be leafed through and written on. Each bitty book pendant has its own unique variation and character and are an ideal one of a kind gift for people who love books!

This book pendant has a silver bail and is covered in a camel colored light brown leather. This pendant measures 2.7 (h) x 2.0 (w) x 1.0 (d) cm - 1 (h) x 4/5 (w) x 3/8 (d) inch.

name: Bitty Book Pendant - Mustard
description:
This miniature leather covered book pendant is bound like a proper book! The text block is sewn by hand and the blank pages can be leafed through and written on. Each bitty book pendant has its own unique variation and character and are an ideal one of a kind gift for people who love books!

This book pendant has a silver bail and is covered in a mustard yellow colored leather. This pendant measures 2.9 (h) x 2.0 (w) x 1.0 (d) cm - 1 1/8 (h) x 4/5 (w) x 3/8 (d) inch.

name: Novel Notebook
description:
These notebooks have been made from old broken or discarded novels.  They contain blank recycled drawing paper pages with some original printed pages interspersed throughout -- just to give you a taste of their original story lines. Notebooks are made from Harlequin Romance Novels, Perry Mason Mysteries, Westerns, & other books with graphically lovely or otherwise amusing covers.

Use a novel notebook to organize your thoughts, as your sketch book, or as your diary... No one will every suspect this is where you record your secrets! 

Options: 
-Request a specific notebook pictured 16$
-Receive a randomly selected notebook 14$

name: Rustic Leather Journal
description:
This grey suede covered journal is hand bound and has a soft texture and feel that only adds to its unique character.  It contains 100 plain white pages made from recycled drawing paper that provide a clear template for your sketches, ideas, stories, travels, memories and more. 

The journal measures 18.0 (h) 15.0 (w) x 2.0 (d) cm or 7 1/8 (h) x 5 7/8 (w) x 3/4 (d) inch.
